description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler with pure virtual methods for handling OCI container events within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface providing callback methods for various OCI container events such as start, stop, failure, and state change.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStartedEvent
methods.description: Called when an OCI container starts, with the container name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStoppedEvent
methods.description: Called when an OCI container stops, with the container name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerFailureEvent
methods.description: Called when an OCI container encounters a failure, with the container name and event data.

methods.name: onOCIContainerStateChangedEvent
methods.description: Called when the OCI container's state changes, with the container name and event data.
